name: Animals Fantasy 3D Lite
description:
Fly through a fantasy 3D world.
The animals fly by the air through the mountains, blue lakes and green grassland.
Find the food necessary to achieve the next level.

The other animals will not make it easy, they will attack you in order to take away your life.
The bigger the enemy, the more damage you receive ...
Take especially careful with do not crash with horses and cows!

Look for water to retrieve healthy.
